result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Victor Alfonso Lacapa

defendant.name: Lacapa, Victor Alfonso
defendant.address: LCO Mens Shelter 12929 W Haskins Rd, Hayward, WI 54843

records.descr: Waiver of time limits for preliminary hearing

records.addlTxt:
8:40 AM Defendant Victor Alfonso Lacapa appeared by video, in custody from Barron County.  Attorney Fredric B. Anderson in court for Victor Alfonso Lacapa.  Attorney Bruce Robert Poquette in court for State of Wisconsin.  Court calls case and recites appearances.  DEF received copy of criminal complaint. Defendant advised of rights/penalties, acknowledges receipt of complaint, waives reading of complaint.  Through counsel, DEF enters NG Plea to Count 2,and waives time limits for preliminary hearing.  Attny request preliminary hearing to be set.  Bond Continues.
Status conference scheduled for October 25, 2022 at 03:30 pm.
Status conference on October 25, 2022 at 03:30 pm.
Initial appearance on August 30, 2022 at 08:30 am.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
11:13AM DEF Victor A. LaCapa in court, appearing by video from in custody in Sawyer County Jail, with Atty Stephanie Thomas-Schmidt (special appearance) appearing by video.  Jennifer Gross appearing by video for the State of WI.    Court calls case and recites appearances.  DEF verifies DOB and address.  DEF does not qualify for public defender appointment.  Court finds probable cause.  State makes bond recommendation.  Atty Thomas-Schmidt has no objection. Court gives the DEF the attorney colloquy. Court sets bond.  Court sets initial appearance for 8/2/22 at 8:30AM. 
 
COURT:  SIBS $1500   NO CONTACT with:  C.A.J.G (dob:  3/10/2007), A.J.M. (dob:  9/26/2006), L.A.M. (dob:  1/11/2007), or J.D.T. (dob:  5/28/2005)
